Romance Guide for Baldur's Gate 3

BG3 Romance Explained

Baldur's Gate 3 Romance

Baldur's Gate 3 gives players the option to start a romance with their companions and other NPCs. It is confirmed that every companion can be romanced, such as Astarion, Gale, Lae'zel, Shadowheart, Wyll, as well as Minthara, and new companions will be a
